an4.100:4.1: Atha kho potaliyo paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.100:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an4.100:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho potaliyaṃ paribbājakaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.100:5.1: * “Cattārome, potaliya, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:5.3: Idha, potaliya, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:5.4: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:5.5: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:5.6: Idha pana, potaliya, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:5.7: Ime kho, potaliya, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:5.8: Imesaṃ kho, potaliya, catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an4.100:6.1: “Cattārome, bho gotama, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:6.3: Idha, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:6.4: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:6.5: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:6.6: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an4.100:6.7: Ime kho, bho gotama, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:6.8: Imesaṃ, bho gotama, catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;
an4.100:6.9: ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:6.11: Abhikkantā hesā, bho gotama, yadidaṃ upekkhā”ti.
an4.100:7.2: Katame cattāro … pe … ime kho, potaliya, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:7.3: Imesaṃ kho, potaliya, catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;
an4.100:7.4: ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:7.6: Abhikkantā hesā, potaliya, yadidaṃ tattha tattha kālaññutā”ti.
an4.100:8.1: “Cattārome, bho gotama, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:8.2: Katame cattāro … pe … ime kho, bho gotama, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.100:8.3: Imesaṃ, bho gotama, catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ yvāyaṃ puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;
an4.100:8.4: ayaṃ me puggalo khamati imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an4.100:8.6: Abhikkantā hesā, bho gotama, yadidaṃ tattha tattha kālaññutā.
an4.100:9.1: Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama.
an4.100:9.2: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
an4.100:9.4: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an4.100:9.5: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an4.100:9.6: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
